title: Grant Shapps – 2021 Comments on Rumours that HS2 Leeds Link to be Scrapped this Week
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Grant Shapps, the Secretary of State for Transport, on 14 November 2021.
content:
Work is continuing on the integrated rail plan. We will publish it shortly and do not comment on speculation.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
